name: Gornom
description:
Gornom is a horror game. Gornom is coming to get what he wants, what does he want? A long mystery is coming with this and more games to tell this Creepy Story in the best possible way.

  Gornom is the winner of Corona Jam, a Brazilian game jam organizated by Amdré Young. See the video with the results: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gLeB-k73gz4 (It is in portuguese).

  CONTROLS:

  • WASD: Walk
  • E: Interact
  • Esc: Pause

A game created by Ciro Ricetti (Cube Legal)

  • Instagram: @ciroricettinovaes
  • Contact email: cubeindustria@gmail.com

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

 :)
